ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>var page=result.match(/\(第\d+\/(\d+)页\)当前\d+条\/页/)[1];
var id=baseUrl.match(/\d+/)
if(baseUrl.match(/_1/)){
	var url=baseUrl;
	}else{
		var go=baseUrl.replace(/list|.html/g,"");
		var url=String(go+"/"+id+"_1/");
}
var list=[];
for(var i=2;i<=page;i++){list.push(url.replace(/_1/,'_'+i))}
list;</js>
